oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oral history interview with Nell Barnes, 1982 August 07, excerpt 04
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Nell Barnes, conducted on 7 August 1982 by Ophelia Paine as part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. 1910-1935 Oral History Project. Barnes discusses attending theatrical and musical performance at venues such at the Princess Theatre and Ryman Auditorium. The complete interview, as well an index, is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Barnes, Nell (Nellie Marie Gardner), b. 1909--Interviews
Princess Theatre (Nashville, Tenn.); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.)
